resources.string: Welcome to WebApper, the simple and secure browser.

In WebApper, the whole application is as simplistic as possible, this means that you won\'t need to find a parameter in a specific menu that is difficult to access, everything is at the top. Scroll the menu at the top to access all the settings, without leaving the application!
Scroll through this text to understand how the menu works then once you are ready press \"OK\".
